trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur gazes upon the snowy peaks with concern.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy stonekeeper at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>The preservation of our stonework has been paramount to the Yok Huy since time immemorial, and the methods of doing so have passed down through generations.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>One such method is the use of melting salts. We must regularly spread them around the stones, lest their edges crack and dull from the bitter cold.

TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>It has proven vital to our restoration, and we seek extra pairs of hands to aid us in the salting. If you wish to lend yours, our stonekeeper can apprise you of the details.

TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>Our new stonework stands as proud as ever, but we must continue to salt the stones if we wish to preserve their integrity. If you've time to aid us again, we would be most grateful.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_006<tab>Seek out our stonekeeper at the workshop─he will provide you all you need.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_CITIZENA05343_000_010<tab>Here to help salt the stonework, you say? Your timing couldn't be better.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_CITIZENA05343_000_011<tab>The work is quite simple, really. For your part, I'd like you to scatter the salts around Warmth.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_CITIZENA05343_000_012<tab>I'll take care of the other areas, so once you've applied your share, you're free to report back to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_CITIZENA05343_000_015<tab>Here to assist, yes? Much obliged. I was just about to start the salting, so why don't we split the work again? I'll leave Warmth to you, as before.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_CITIZENA05343_000_016<tab>You needn't worry about the other areas─I'll cover them, as usual. Once you've applied your share, you're free to report back to Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>I hear you were hard at work spreading melting salts at Warmth! The stonekeeper and I greatly appreciate the effort. Were you aware that the salts we use are brought to us by Nopli?

TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>As he tells it, he's procured a healthy supply from the Yok Huy at Chirwagur Saltern. He is brave to consort with such dangerous folk...but that fearlessness speaks to his experience as a merchant.
TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_025<tab>In any event, fresh snowfall is inevitable in a place like this, so I do not doubt we shall have need of you again before long.

TEXT_BANYOK108_05343_VUYARGUR_000_026<tab>All finished with the salting, then? Very good. Fresh snow will be upon us again soon, I imagine...but when that time comes, I hope you'll be open to offering your assistance.
